subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Gonzalez, in his fourth season as Seton Hall’s men’s basketball coach, has emerged as one of the most divisive and volatile characters in the Big East conference.
snippet: Bobby Gonzalez, in his fourth season as Seton Hall’s men’s basketball coach, has emerged as one of the most divisive and volatile characters in the Big East conference.
